pr_title: Flush logger context for LR on exit

timeline.bodyText: can we move this to a flushAsyncAppender() function?
timeline.author: annym

timeline.bodyText:
Should we add a check to see if the activeServer is null?
If startDiscoveryService throws an exception, activeServer will be null and the shutdown hook hit NPE. Logger flush will be skipped.
